articles.description: The actress has left the “Star Wars” bullies behind to star as Disney’s first Southeast Asian princess in “Raya and the Last Dragon.” She says, “I’m finally asking for the things I want.”
articles.title: Kelly Marie Tran: ‘I’m Not Afraid Anymore’ - The New York Times
